source.sqlReaderQuery:
SELECT [ORIGINAL_BLOB_LANDING_CONTAINER],
	[ORIGINAL_BLOB_NAME],
	[ORIGINAL_BLOP_FULLPATH],
	[TARGET_BLOB_LANDING_CONTAINER],
	[TARGET_BLOB_NAME],
	[DATALAKE_CONTAINER],
	[DATALAKE_FILE_PATH],
	[ORIGINAL_BLOB_ARCHIVE_CONTAINER],
	[ORIGINAL_BLOB_ARCHIVE_FULLPATH],
	CONCAT(DATALAKE_CONTAINER,'/',DATALAKE_FILE_PATH,'/',TARGET_BLOB_NAME) AS DATALAKE_FULL_PATHFILE
FROM [log].[SOURCE_REGISTER_TABLE]
WHERE [ETL_IS_PROCESSED] = 'N'
AND [ORIGINAL_BLOB_NAME] LIKE 'OPS_PRICE_POINT_%'
ORDER BY [ORIGINAL_BLOB_NAME];

SELECT count(*) Total_Error
  FROM [staging].[OPS_Incident]
  WHERE [Validation_Error] IS NOT NULL

typeProperties.script:
parameters{
	ProcessName as string,
	FileName as string,
	Etl_Utc_Tag as string
}
source(output(
		Price_Point_Code as string,
		Price_Point as string,
		Active_YN as string,
		Validation_Error as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> StagingDB
source(output(
		Price_Point_Code as string,
		Price_Point as string,
		Active_YN as string,
		Insert_Datetime as timestamp,
		Update_Datetime as timestamp,
		Process_Name as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> RelationalPricePoint
GenerateStagingChecksum select(mapColumn(
		Price_Point_Code,
		Price_Point,
		Active_YN,
		Validation_Error,
		StagingChecksum
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: false,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: false) ~> SelectStagingData
SelectNewRecordData derive(insert_datetime = fromUTC(currentUTC(), 'Australia/Sydney'),
		process_name = concatWS('_',$ProcessName,$FileName)) ~> AddAuditColumns
RelationalPricePoint derive(RelationalChecksum = sha2(256, Price_Point,Active_YN)) ~> GenerateRelationalChecksum
GenerateRelationalChecksum select(mapColumn(
		Relation_Price_Point_Code = Price_Point_Code,
		Relation_Price_Point = Price_Point,
		Relation_Active_YN = Active_YN,
		Relation_Insert_Datetime = Insert_Datetime,
		Relation_Update_Datetime = Update_Datetime,
		Relation_Process_Name = Process_Name,
		Relation_RelationalChecksum = RelationalChecksum
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectRelationalData
StagingDB derive(StagingChecksum = sha2(256, Price_Point,Active_YN)) ~> GenerateStagingChecksum
SelectStagingData, SelectRelationalData lookup(Price_Point_Code == Relation_Price_Point_Code,
	multiple: true,
	broadcast: 'none')~> CompareKeys
AddAuditColumns, SelectChangeRecord union(byName: true)~> UnionNewAndExisting
NewAndExistingPricePoint@NewPricePoint select(mapColumn(
		Price_Point_Code,
		Price_Point,
		Active_YN
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectNewRecordData
UnionNewAndExisting alterRow(upsertIf(true())) ~> AlterRowUpsert
CompareKeys split(isNull(Relation_RelationalChecksum),
	StagingChecksum != Relation_RelationalChecksum,
	disjoint: false) ~> NewAndExistingPricePoint@(NewPricePoint, ChangedPricePoint, ExistingNoChange)
NewAndExistingPricePoint@ChangedPricePoint derive(update_datetime = fromUTC(currentUTC(), 'Australia/Sydney'),
		process_name = concatWS('_',$ProcessName,$FileName)) ~> ChangedAddAuditData
ChangedAddAuditData select(mapColumn(
		Price_Point_Code = Relation_Price_Point,
		Price_Point,
		Active_YN,
		insert_datetime = Relation_Insert_Datetime,
		update_datetime,
		process_name
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectChangeRecord
AlterRowUpsert sink(input(
		Price_Point_Code as string,
		Price_Point as string,
		Active_YN as string,
		Insert_Datetime as timestamp,
		Update_Datetime as timestamp,
		Process_Name as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:false,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:true,
	keys:['Price_Point_Code'],
	format: 'table',
	mapColumn(
		Price_Point_Code,
		Price_Point,
		Active_YN,
		Insert_Datetime = insert_datetime,
		Update_Datetime = update_datetime,
		Process_Name = process_name
	)) ~> UpserttRow

source(output(
		Price_Point_Code as string,
		Price_Point as string,
		Active_YN as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> LoadFromScrubbedToStagingDB
ValidatedPricePointCode@ValidPricePointCode select(mapColumn(
		Price_Point_Code,
		Price_Point,
		Active_YN
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectValidRecord
LoadFromScrubbedToStagingDB split(not(isNull(Price_Point_Code)) && trim(Price_Point_Code) != '',
	disjoint: false) ~> ValidatedPricePointCode@(ValidPricePointCode, InvalidPricePointCode)
InvalidPricePointCodeerrormessage select(mapColumn(
		Price_Point_Code,
		Price_Point,
		Active_YN,
		Validation_Error
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectInvalidPricePointCode
ValidatedPricePointCode@InvalidPricePointCode derive(Validation_Error = toString("Invalid Price Pint Code")) ~> InvalidPricePointCodeerrormessage
SelectValidRecord, SelectInvalidPricePointCode union(byName: true)~> UnionAll
UnionAll sink(input(
		Price_Point_Code as string,
		Price_Point as string,
		Active_YN as string,
		Validation_Error as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	truncate:true,
	format: 'table',
	mapColumn(
		Price_Point_Code,
		Price_Point,
		Active_YN,
		Validation_Error
	)) ~> StagingDB
